p: The antioxidant activity was estimated by using adapted 2, 2′-diphenyl-b-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) method. Ascorbic acid (IC 50 = 2.0 μM) and methanol were used as positive and negative controls, respectively. 49 and 413 showed remarkable antioxidant activity with IC 50 values of 2.50 and 5.75 μM respectively [ 24].
